alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Polk County through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harmony to 9 miles southwest of Lake Kissimmee. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Haines City, Lake Wales, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Frostproof, Davenport, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Indian Lake Estates, River Ranch, Cypress Gardens, Lake Wales Municipal Airport, Babson Park, Waverly, Loughman and Wahneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
